Metadata.Title: CVE-2007-4559 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2007-4559 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.9.19-1, affected by CVE-2007-4559
